thread.title: Lady buys IKEA lamp, upgrades it to legit looking Death Star (10 Photos)
thread.title_full: Lady buys IKEA lamp, upgrades it to legit looking Death Star (10 Photos)

author: Sebastian
title: Lady buys IKEA lamp, upgrades it to legit looking Death Star (10 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
We’ve all gone to IKEA to fill a void in our place with some basic looking furniture. Most of the time it just barely does the job, and you rarely get your money’s worth before it ends up breaking or malfunctioning. Not the case when this girl moved in with her boyfriend and decided to gave her newly purchased lamp the Star Wars upgrade. 2 
She purchased the an IKEA PS 2014 lamp and spray painted the entire globe. 3 
Then used masking tape to tape of the parts they wanted darker. 4 
Next was tracing a stencil onto the lamp for greater detail. 5 
Next was to paint over everything with a darker color for contrast. Advertisement 6 7 
In the end, it doesn’t have top be perfect, because the light shining through will hide all the imperfections. 8 
Then hang on the ceiling… 9
